title: Kinlochleven to Fort William Walk Route

description: This is the final leg of the epic West Highland Way long distance walk, running from Kinlochleven to the trail end at Fort William. The route runs for distance of just over 14 miles with splendid views over Loch Leven and Glen Coe to enjoy on the way. You'll also pass the secluded Lochan Lunn Da Bhra before a woodland section through the Nevis Forest at the foot of Ben Nevis . For the previous leg of the journey see the Kingshouse to Kinlochleven Walk page.
